casebody.data:
Sprague v. Bartholdi Hotel Co. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. October 24, 1892.) Action by Daniel J. Sprague against the Bartholdi Hotel Company.

Argued before Freedman and MoAdam, JJ.

J. N. Hayes, for plaintiff. Meyers & Anable, for defendant.

No opinion. The order appealed from should be affirmed, with $10 costs and disbursements. See 3 N. Y. Supp. 829.
